original_title: Ciné-Guerrillas: Scenes from the Labudović Reels
overview: Documentarian Mila Turajlic returns to the Festival with the story of Yugoslavian leader Josip Broz Tito's favourite cameraman, the Algerian War for Independence, and an untold chapter in the history of anti-colonial cinema.
title: Ciné-Guerrillas: Scenes from the Labudović Reels
